Synopsis: Replaces values in a specified field of a table.
Description: This function replaces values in a specified field of a table with the provided replacements.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-TableReplace -FieldName "Status" -Replacements @("Active", "Inactive")
Description:
Replaces values in the "Status" field with "Active" or "Inactive".

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
New-TableReplace -FieldName "Priority" -Replacements @("High", "Medium", "Low")
Description:
Replaces values in the "Priority" field with "High", "Medium", or "Low".
